sourcesContent:
import React ,{ useState} from "react"; import './uploadNotes.css'; import $ from 'jquery'; import { Subjects } from '../subjectsData'; export default function UploadNotes() { const [ branch,setBranch ] = useState(Subjects); var result = Subjects; function setValues(e) { setBranch(e.target.value); result = result.filter(obj => { return obj.Branch === branch; }); console.log(result); } $('.dropdown-el').click(function(e) { e.preventDefault(); e.stopPropagation(); $(this).toggleClass('expanded'); $('#'+$(e.target).attr('for')).prop('checked',true); }); $(document).click(function() { $('.dropdown-el').removeClass('expanded'); }); return(

) }
